title: kunrengumE ninra
sahitya:
kunrengumE ninra enran kumaranE nI unran kaiyil kOl onrEn koNDanaiyO


anupallavi

  kanru mADugaLOTTi senru kATTil mEitta kaNNan tAnEndina daNDam unakkIndAnO


caraNam    nandi vAhanam vITra tandai pOTrum maghanE nandagOpAlan viyanda vindai maruganE
enda vidam undanai vandanai sheidAlun cintai kanindu varam tandenakkruLvAyO
